Usage: msi2pyexpander.py [options] {files}

this program converts EPICS substitution files to pyexpander format.

Options:
  --version             show program's version number and exit
  -h, --help            show this help message and exit
  --summary             convert msi substitution files to pyexpander format.
  -S SUBSTITUTIONFILE, --substitutionfile=SUBSTITUTIONFILE
                        specify the SUBSTITUTIONFILE
  -o OUTPUTFILE, --outputfile=OUTPUTFILE
                        specify the OUTPUTFILE
